summary: "Skyrim GatherMate" , For those who know the "GatherMate" plugin from World of Warcraft, Displays the locations of resources on the map, Adding them each time you discover a new location for the resource, It's like the DragonBorn drew them on the map to be able to find them later when necessary.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]/!\Beware/!\[/size][/center]
This Mod is unfinished, but should work for all outside Ore Veins, If you want to see what the mod does for inside Ore Veins go to "Embershard Mine" next to "RiverWood" and find all Iron Ore veins inside ( there should be 8 ),
You can check your progress Under "Mining Locations - E1"

[size=3][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size]

"Skyrim GatherMate" , For those who know the "GatherMate" plugin from World of Warcraft, Displays the locations of resources on the map, Adding them each time you discover a new location for the resource, It's like the DragonBorn drew them on the map to be able to find
author: Mitsarugi and Willy4x4
